name: mern-template
description: This template provides a minimal setup to get React working in Vite with an Express / Mongo backend.

scripts.install: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix server && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix server" "npm run preview --prefix client"

author: Louis Van Aken (vanakenlouis@gmail.com)
